class.name: JTopPlugin
class.comment: Returns a JTop tab to be added in JConsole.
Returns a SwingWorker which is responsible for updating the JTop tab.
Property listener to reset the MBeanServerConnection at reconnection time.
class.javadoc: JTopPlugin is a subclass to com.sun.tools.jconsole.JConsolePlugin JTopPlugin is loaded and instantiated by JConsole. One instance is created for each window that JConsole creates. It listens to the connected property change so that it will update JTop with the valid MBeanServerConnection object. JTop is a JPanel object displaying the thread and its CPU usage information.

method.name: getTabs
method.comment: use LinkedHashMap if you want a predictable order of the tabs to be added in JConsole

method.name: propertyChange
method.comment: JConsole supports disconnection and reconnection The MBeanServerConnection will become invalid when disconnected. Need to use the new MBeanServerConnection object created at reconnection time.
